title: 加州橡树岭高中社会学实验课堂

action: Sit quietly at desk, observe classroom and teacher
thoughts: First day of this sociology experiment. I should follow all the rules carefully and make a good impression. The classroom looks formal with the flags and uniforms. I wonder what we'll be learning today.
memory: Noticed formal classroom setup with flags
Preparing to follow all rules carefully

action: Raise hand properly while maintaining upright posture
thoughts: I should follow the rules and ask permission before speaking. The teacher seems to be getting ready to start class, and I want to make a good impression by showing proper respect for the authority structure.
memory: Following classroom protocol by raising hand before speaking
Maintaining proper posture to avoid losing discipline points
Waiting for teacher's permission to speak

action: Maintain proper posture while observing teacher for instructions
thoughts: The teacher hasn't acknowledged my raised hand yet. I should wait patiently and follow the rules. I don't want to lose any discipline points or draw negative attention.
memory: Waiting for teacher's permission to speak
Following classroom protocol carefully to maintain good standing
Observing teacher's movements for cues on when to speak

action: Maintain proper posture while discreetly observing the teacher for permission to speak
thoughts: The teacher still hasn't noticed my raised hand from earlier. I should keep waiting patiently and follow the rules. I don't want to lose any discipline points by speaking out of turn. Maybe if I maintain perfect posture, the teacher will eventually see me.
memory: Waiting patiently for teacher's attention to follow proper speaking protocol
Maintaining perfect posture to avoid losing discipline points
Observing teacher's movements for any indication of permission to speak
